snippet: Elements of American show business and North Korean propaganda came together when the former basketball star Dennis Rodman said in Pyongyang that North Koreans “love” their new leader, Kim Jong-un.
abstract: Elements of American show business and North Korean propaganda came together when the former basketball star Dennis Rodman said in Pyongyang that North Koreans “love” their new leader, Kim Jong-un.

headline.main: With Rodman Stunt, American Reality TV and North Korean Propaganda Fuse
